live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
40965.summary: Customers in Saint Adolphe are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40965.title: Aug 21 – Saint Adolphe | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
